data.title: How InpharmD uses Amazon Kendra and Amazon Lex to drive evidence-based patient care
data.tags: Amazon Kendra, Amazon Lex, Artificial Intelligence, Case Study, Customer Solutions
data.description: The intersection of DI and AI: Drug information refers to the discovery, use, and management of healthcare and medical information. Healthcare providers have many challenges associated with drug information discovery, such as intensive time involvement, lack of accessibility, and accuracy of reliable data. The average clinical query requires a literature search that takes an average of 18.5 hours. In addition, drug information often lies in disparate information silos, behind pay walls and design walls, and quickly becomes stale.
